reasoning.skills_analysis: The candidate possesses all required technical skills, including expert-level Python, comprehensive AWS service knowledge (EC2, S3, Lambda, ECS, EKS), and proficiency in Docker and Kubernetes. They also meet the database requirements (SQL and NoSQL) and CI/CD expertise.

reasoning.projects_analysis: Relevant projects include open-source contributions to Kubernetes and Docker, as well as a practical ML-based resume screening tool, demonstrating both community involvement and technical breadth.
reasoning.role_fit_analysis: The candidate is an exceptional fit, meeting 100% of the mandatory requirements and all of the 'Nice to Have' criteria.
